articles.title: How to tell if you're at risk of heart failure from your smart watch - Daily Mail
articles.description: A smart watch user simply has to watch for 15 seconds to see if any of their heartbeats - the tall vertical spikes in the ECG pattern - come too close together, said University College London experts.
articles.content:
A smart watch is not just a handy way to check emails it may warn if you are at risk of developing heart failure.
